article: Dear friends, Please come to my house for a welcome party for Lisa. Lisa is from America. She moved here  _  her parents last week. She's my new friend and neighbor. Her house is next to  _  . We usually go to school together. Lisa and I were born in the same year. She is as old as I am.  _  she is much taller. Lisa is very beautiful. Her big eyes make her look  _  . She's very helpful, too. She  always  likes to help others. She also has a good sense of humor. She likes  _  funny jokes. I never feel  _  or unhappy when she's with me. Lisa is a true friend. When  _  worries me. I always go to her for help. I can tell her anything because she can keep secrets. We like to talk with each other because we always have the same  _  . Lisa wants to make friends with all of you. She can tell us about her life in America in English. I believe you will be  _  with her, because she is a cheerful girl. The party will begin at 7:00 p.m. in my house on Saturday. We look forward to seeing you then. Yours, Betty
